FragilityCurve.Description: Filing cabinet, unanchored laterally. Cabinet has 2 drawers and is 15" deep x 24" tall
FragilityCurve.Name: Vertical Filing Cabinet, 2 drawer, unanchored laterally
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: Peak floor velocity limit is calculated as a function of the aspect ratio of the filing cabinet and the building period, T. At the ground floor the fragility will be based upon the ground motion only. This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data. Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence. Import errors: Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: E2022.112a:DS1:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5

DamageState.Description: Filing cabinet falls over and contents are scattered. Likely damage to file cabinet.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Replace filing cabinet and refile / replace contents.
